Potato___Early_blight.name: Potato Early Blight
Potato___Early_blight.cause: Fungal disease caused by Alternaria solani.
Potato___Early_blight.prevention: Use resistant varieties, remove infected plants, and apply fungicides.

Potato___Late_blight.name: Potato Late Blight
Potato___Late_blight.cause: Fungal disease caused by Phytophthora infestans.
Potato___Late_blight.prevention: Use resistant varieties, manage moisture, and apply fungicides.
